page.title: 12Interesting People In Hoo.
page.content: {Mr.Worsdale}is an author, who lives in Hoo. He's written 3 books about Hoo. He was born in{Threekingham {Lincolnshire,}where he saw Margaret Thatcher as a young girl. He left school at 14 to work for a Gas Company After a few years he applied for a job in{Tonbridge,}but didn't attend the interview. He then moved to{East {Yorkshire,}but joined up in{1939}for the war. He was at the{Siege of Malta but spent most of his time at sea in the{Middle East.}When he returned to England in{1947}he took a teaching course in{Kidderminster.}Finally he got a job in{West Bromwich}to teach at a Grammar School. He also took jobs in {Staffordshire and Birmingham.}Until he finally came to Hoo in{1961,}where he became Deputy Headmaster of the Hundred of Hoo Comprehensive School.
